message: I'm currently using SnapzPro for most of my screenshooting, but both of these tools look rather nice too. I previously used Skitch while there only was the free version and kind of forgot about it. What of these two do you prefer or do you have some other tool altogether? And does any of them support storing the annotated screenshots as PSD or similar format that supports layers?

For me personally Skitch just looks far more lightweight than LittleSnapper, which is why I'll probably get that. I don't really need a tool to manage my screenshots since I usually take them for embedding somewhere and for nothing else :-)
Can you get the entire webpage in skitch? I can only figure out how to grab whatever is on the screen.
Yes, click on the arrow next to Skitch's icon on the menu bar and select "Snap Safari"
